perturbation.original_text: During the Term, notwithstanding the Services rendered by Nexstar, WYZZ shall retain exclusive authority, power and control over WYZZ-TV's programming, personnel, and finances.
perturbation.changed_text: During the Term, notwithstanding the Services rendered by Nexstar, WYZZ shall retain exclusive authority, power and control over WYZZ-TV's programming, workforce, and finances.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'personnel' and 'workforce' are used interchangeably although the contract never defines them as being equivalent. This creates uncertainty because 'workforce' may be interpreted more broadly than 'personnel', potentially leading to disputes over who has control over certain individuals or groups working at WYZZ-TV.
perturbation.location: Section 6. Stations Operations. a. WYZZ-TV Operations. (i)

perturbation.original_text: Nexstar shall maintain the Equipment in good order and repair in accordance with industry standards. Subject to the reduction of the Section 2(a) Amount in accordance with Section 2(a) hereof, Nexstar shall bear the cost of maintaining and repairing the Equipment.
perturbation.changed_text: Nexstar shall maintain the Equipment in acceptable condition and repair. Subject to the reduction of the Section 2(a) Amount in accordance with Section 2(a) hereof, Nexstar shall bear the expense of maintaining and repairing the Equipment.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'good order' is replaced with 'acceptable condition' and 'cost' is replaced with 'expense'. The term acceptable condition is very vague. It is unclear if acceptable condition means the equipment can be in disrepair as long as the expense is covered.

perturbation.original_text: Each Party shall make a payment to the other with respect to certain mutually agreed upon expenses and capital expenditures incurred (or to be incurred) as a result of the relationship created by this Agreement, such payments to be made promptly following the incurrence of any expenses and/or expenditures.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Party shall make a payment to the other with respect to certain mutually agreed upon expenses and capital outlays incurred (or to be incurred) as a result of the relationship created by this Agreement, such payments to be made promptly following the incurrence of any expenses and/or expenditures.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'capital expenditures' is replaced with 'capital outlays'. While they may seem synonymous, 'capital expenditures' has a very specific accounting definition and tax implications, which might differ from a common lay definition of 'capital outlays'. It's not clear if they refer to the same thing. This could lead to disagreement about what constitutes shared expenditures.
